Comment: The reason to have specialized lgbtq+ suicide hotlines is because queer people face a lot of struggles that non-queer people do not, and those struggles play into the elevated rates of suicidal ideation that we tend to deal with.  To be more specific: If a teenager who just got kicked out of his house by his fundamentalist christian parents for being gay calls a suicide hotline, it's probably a good idea for the person who picks up to have specialized training to help talk them through those feelings, as opposed to, say, another fundamentalist Christian who is going to sympathize more with that kids shitty parents.
